column1: Back from business trip in Shanghai. No quarantine necessary acc to PHE. I'm now avoiding that street & places he may go. #British need educating on #coronavirus. A @HotpointSupport man on phone this morning told me there was nothing to worry about as flu kills more. #Hotpointpic.twitter.com/QGfK7dTWKU

I don't think it is. At my hosp appt Tuesday the HCA coughed over me. I asked if she had #coronavirus? Replied "No, I haven't been by a Chinese person." 
If #NHS @NHSEngland staff think it's only from Chinese, God help the rest of us.I'm a Brit & scared of Brit 3 streets from me
@TheJohnSudworth Just seen you on the @BBCNews at 11pm. Thank you for insight into what's really happening with #coronavirus. Stay safe. I hope they find a cure & vaccine soon.

I read it all. Thank you. Can you ask @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @GavinWilliamson @WHO @PHE_uk @DHSCgovuk @NHSEngland to read it please? More needs to be done. #coronavirus #coronavirusuk #coronaviruschina #coronaviruswuhan

@BorisJohnson @MattHancock @PHE_uk @DHSCgovuk @CMO_England I think the UK should cancel anything that attracts lots of people. What about @MRCPUK UK PACES exams & risks to patients? #COVID19 #coronavirus #infectionprevention better than #contacttracing.https://twitter.com/abcnews/status/1227711004726960134 …

@PrincessCruises The passengers really appreciate what the crew and #Captain are doing for all #quarantined on #DiamondPrincess but they are all struggling. #DavidAbel has requested @richardbranson help the Brits out of #COVIDｰ19 #coronavirus nightmare 
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=10220683436497963&id=1297536431 …https://twitter.com/PrincessCruises/status/1227986466061606912 …

Not everyone is told to self isolate or quarantine so if they are infected they unknowingly go around spreading it like the #superspreader linked with #Brighton & #Hove case. These guidelines IMO are not adequate to keep every person in the #UK free of #COVID19 #coronavirus
